archiefmat.titel: Geheime besluiten van de Gouverneur (zgn. "Geheime resoluties")
archiefmat.titel_eng: Secret decisions of the Governor (the so-called "Secret resolutions")
archiefmat.scope: The secret resolutions with appendices like letters, statements, petitions etc. generally concern matters of military importance, public order (including the questions regarding the treatment of slaves), questions involving sensitive information regarding civil and military personnel, and reactions to secret dispatches received from the Ministry of Colonies. Only for a few individual years a register was added.
archiefmat.notes:
The complete series up to 1950 consists of 270 packs, 21 folders and 2 documents.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
